eng: O all you wise men of Israel, the makers of golden thread, make a robe of Aaron befitting the honor of the priesthood...
of our honored father, the archpriest, Pope Abba (...), and our father the bishop (the metropolitan), Abba (...), the beloved of Christ.
cop: Nicabeu tyrou `nte pi`crayl nyterhwb `enikap `nnoub ma;amio `nou`s;yn `nA`arwn@ kata `patio `n]metouyb...
mpeniwt ettayiout `nar,i`ereuc papa abba (nim) nem peniwt `n`epickopoc abba (nim) nimenra] `nte Pi`,rictoc
